name: blazingsql
description: BlazingSQL provides a high-performance distributed SQL engine in Python. Built on the RAPIDS GPU data science ecosystem, ETL massive datasets on GPUs.
preInstallNotes: This package can use GPUs. Attention no data persistence is guaranteed. You must therefore make sure to save your notebooks on Gitlab or manually manage the downloading and uploading of your notebooks.
postInstallNotes: The token is your password for all services. You can get it inside Onyxia in your profil settings
